snippet.title: Woman mauled to death by dog
snippet.content: A WOMAN has died after being mauled by a dog in Southern River. WA Police have confirmed a woman in her 50s received life threatening injuries from a dog at a canine boarding kennel about 1.30pm yesterday. She was declared dead by St John Ambulance officers and the dog was seized by the City of Gosnells rangers. Her death is not being treated as suspicious and a report is being prepared for the Coroner.
